title: DETOX TREATMENT
description: Balanced Face Detox is a treatment kit by Freihaut to clean and illuminate every skin type
text:
OPEN
10 ml
Double-action mask-cream: it opens the pore to facilitate the extraction and calms the skin so that the extraction process is less painful.
A single-dose kit made from natural extracts with all the phases needed to cleanse all skin types, even the most sensitive and delicate ones.
Double-action mask-cream: it opens the pore to facilitate the extraction and calms the skin so that the extraction process is less painful.
Cocktail made from powerful regenerative, soothing and balancing plants, to give the skin back all its balance and vitality after the extraction process. It helps to close the pore and profoundly nourishes.
Clayey acid peeling that removes dead cells from the corneal surface, thus reducing roughness.
Mask made from soothing and regenerative clays. After the extraction, the skin will appear hydrated, soothed and very bright, even the most sensitive ones.
